annotations.title: Modern Classic: Spanish Coffee

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Mr. Black Coffee Liqueur
.75oz (22.5ml) Goslings 151 Rum
.25oz (7.5ml) Triple Sec
.25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syrup
Coffee
Sugar Rim
Top Heavy Cream

Rim tempered glass footed glass with a thick layer of sugar (use lemon to adhere)
Add rum and Triple Sec and light on fire. 
Turn glass, using fire to melt sugar. 
Place another glass ontop to put out fire. 
Add remaining ingredients. 
Top with heavy cream
